xml:
Oral suspension
Cautionary and advisory labels

Label 9 - Space the doses evenly throughout the day. Keep taking this medicine until the course is finished, unless you are told to stop

Label 22 - Take 30 to 60 minutes before food

Co-fluampicil 125mg/125mg/5ml oral suspension <ph outputclass="manufacturer">(A A H Pharmaceuticals Ltd)</ph> 18542211000001108

Ampicillin (as Ampicillin trihydrate) 25 mg per 1 ml

Flucloxacillin (as Flucloxacillin magnesium) 25 mg per 1 ml

  • 100 ml POM

    NHS indicative price = £23.93

    Drug Tariff (Part VIIIA Category A) price = £23.93

Co-fluampicil 125mg/125mg/5ml oral suspension <ph outputclass="manufacturer">(Alliance Healthcare (Distribution) Ltd)</ph> 18446411000001102

Ampicillin (as Ampicillin trihydrate) 25 mg per 1 ml

Flucloxacillin (as Flucloxacillin magnesium) 25 mg per 1 ml

  • 100 ml POM

    NHS indicative price = £23.93

    Drug Tariff (Part VIIIA Category A) price = £23.93

Co-fluampicil 125mg/125mg/5ml oral suspension <ph outputclass="manufacturer">(Wockhardt UK Ltd)</ph> 18421711000001100

Ampicillin (as Ampicillin trihydrate) 25 mg per 1 ml

Flucloxacillin (as Flucloxacillin magnesium) 25 mg per 1 ml

  • 100 ml POM

    NHS indicative price = £23.93

    Drug Tariff (Part VIIIA Category A) price = £23.93
